players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I find it strange that Bob was the one who was found dead last night. Let's be vigilant and keep an eye on each other during this game."
Charlie: "I agree with Alice. Let's keep a close eye on each other to ensure the safety of our team."
You: "I'd like to propose that we all share our observations and suspicions during the night. This way, we can work together to ensure the safety of our team and uncover any potential threats."

Charlie: "I'd like to suggest that we all share our observations and suspicions during the night, just as Alice proposed earlier. This will help us work together to ensure the safety of our team and uncover any potential threats."
Diana: "I will remain silent tonight, as I have already taken my action. Let's see what happens during the night and discuss our findings in the morning."
